p: Lopinavir (2 S)- N-[(2 S,4 S,5 S)-5-[2-(2,6-dimethylphenoxy)acetamido]-4-hydroxy-1,6-diphenylhex-an-2-yl]-3-methyl-2-(2-oxo-1,3-diazinan-1-yl)butanamide) is an anti-HIV compound, approved in 2001. The drug was shown to be active against FIV in vitro but did not prevent FIV replication completely [ 85]. There are no in vivo studies in FIV-infected cats.
